title: LibP2P start-up ignores `AddrInUse` error
body:
## Description

## Version

Lighthouse Lighthouse/v0.2.0/7fc1f5593+
BLS Library: blst

One of my slasher commits -- descended from 20ee8939691bcffc2171ef26a18573b1db8f0276

## Present Behaviour

Lighthouse starts in a crippled state (not listening on :9000)

## Expected Behaviour

Lighthouse quits if it can't obtain exclusive access to port 9000
I'm going to increase the log on this one and handle a more sophisticated client shutdown in #1494
Partially resolved in #1495 and closing in favour of #1494
